REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0832 reute u f BC-JEFFERIES-MAKES-MARKE 03-19 0055

TEXT.TITLE: JEFFERIES MAKES MARKET GENCORP, AMERICAN EXPRESS
TEXT.BODY: Jefferies and Co said this morning that it is making a market in Gencorp <GY>. The bid is 106 and the ask is 111. Jefferies also said it is making a market in American Express <AXP>. Jeffries opened the stock and the bid is 79-1/2 and the ask is 81. Reuter
